name: Stamp Stomp
description:
You are a stamp and you have to stomp. Try to stamp the "Stamp here" marker with accuracy for increasing points.  Don't miss any because you have only 5 lives. Enjoy and try to make a highscore. Move with mouse.
Stomp with left click or spacebar.

Design & Programming & 3d Art: @apostolossvls

Art & SFX: @shyguyboo

Made for the Trijam #206 within 3 hours (with breaks).

Theme: "Just another copy".

The game fits the theme as the stamp has the purpose to leave behind "just another copy".
